com.nhn.android.maps

Interface NMapView.OnMapStateChangeListener

  • Enclosing class:
    NMapView

    public static interface NMapView.OnMapStateChangeListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the state of a map view changed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAnimationStateChange(NMapView mapView, int animType, int animState)
      Called when the animation state of a map view has changed.
      void onMapCenterChange(NMapView mapView, NGeoPoint center)
      Called when the center of a map view has changed.
      void onMapCenterChangeFine(NMapView mapView) 
      void onMapInitHandler(NMapView mapView, NMapError errorInfo)
      Called when the MapViewer Library has been initialized.
      void onZoomLevelChange(NMapView mapView, int level)
      Called when the zoom level of a map view has changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onMapInitHandler

        void onMapInitHandler(NMapView mapView,
                    NMapError errorInfo)
        Called when the MapViewer Library has been initialized.
        Parameters:
        mapView - The map view whose state has changed.
        errorInfo - null if succeeded or an error if failed.

      • onMapCenterChange

        void onMapCenterChange(NMapView mapView,
                     NGeoPoint center)
        Called when the center of a map view has changed.
        Parameters:
        mapView - The map view whose state has changed.
        center - The new location of map center.

      • onMapCenterChangeFine

        void onMapCenterChangeFine(NMapView mapView)

      • onZoomLevelChange

        void onZoomLevelChange(NMapView mapView,
                     int level)
        Called when the zoom level of a map view has changed.
        Parameters:
        mapView - The map view whose state has changed.
        level - The new zoom level of v.

      • onAnimationStateChange

        void onAnimationStateChange(NMapView mapView,
                          int animType,
                          int animState)
        Called when the animation state of a map view has changed.
        Parameters:
        mapView - The map view whose state has changed.
        animType - NMapView.ANIMATION_TYPE_ZOOM for zoom animation, NMapView.ANIMATION_TYPE_PAN for pan animation
        animState - NMapView.ANIMATION_STATE_FINISHED when a animation has been finished, NMapView.ANIMATION_STATE_STARTED when a animation to be started.
